notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Involved in every stage of this study, manuscript writing, and data analysis, Y.-G.K.; conducted the field productivity test of P. multiflorum, R.K., D.H.J., K.J., Y.P.; conducted the LC/MS experiment, T.K.L., K.H.K.; collected and authenticated the P. multiflorum samples, B.C.M.; collected P. multiflorum samples and carried out field productivity test, technically designed, and helped in writing the manuscript Y.K. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
